item.title: flexdashboard
item.description: Automated Dashboard With various Correlaton Visualizations in R. For details see https://datascienceplus.com/automated-dashboard-with-various-correlation-visualizations-in-r/

item.title: magick
item.description: library(magick) ## Linking to ImageMagick 6.9.9.14 ## Enabled features: cairo, freetype, fftw, ghostscript, lcms, pango, rsvg, webp ## Disabled features: fontconfig, x11 library(magrittr) image_read("https://jeroen.github.io/images/birds.jpg") image_read("https://jeroen.github.io/images/birds.jpg")%>%image_crop('1200x300+100+1700')%>%image_ocr()%>%cat() ## H Grenveld. del Watherby & 0Â° ## CLIMACTERIS PICUMNUS. ## (BROWN TREE CREEPER).

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
